insert.if: insert into tbl_order(codeNo, cartCnt, proPrice, id, payNo, addrNo, coumemberNo) values(#{cart.codeNo}, #{cart.cartCnt}, #{cart.salePrice}, #{cart.id}, #{payNo}, #{addrNo}, #{coumemberNo})
insert into tbl_order(codeNo, cartCnt, proPrice, id, payNo, addrNo) values(#{cart.codeNo}, #{cart.cartCnt}, #{cart.salePrice}, #{cart.id}, #{payNo}, #{addrNo})

mapper.select: select * from tbl_order where payNo=#{payNo} and id=#{id};

select codeNo, proName, cartCnt, proPrice, (select sum(proPrice)from tbl_order where payNo = #{payNo}) as totalPrice, couMemberNo from tbl_order join tbl_product using(codeNo) where payNo = #{payNo} and id=#{id}

select orderNo, payNo, proName, a.regDate, cartCnt, codeNo, count(orderNo)as orderNoCnt, a.coumemberNo, sum(proPrice)-IFNULL(couPrice, 0) as totalPrice from tbl_coupon tc join tbl_coumember tc2 using(couNo) right join tbl_order a using(coumemberNO) join tbl_product using (codeNo) where a.id=#{id} group by (payNo) ORDER BY a.regDate desc
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_order where payNo=#{payNo} and id=#{id};
